title: Online Supplement Store
cleaned_text: Link Above Access to over 200 companies and over 1000 different supplements! HOW TO ORDER ONLINE: - Click [HERE](http://us.fullscript.com/welcome/drmwolford) to access online medicinary - Enter your email address & hit submit - Enter your email, name and desired password - Order your desired supplements! BLOOD DRAW SITES: - Click [HERE](https://www.npscript.com/drmichellewolford) to access draw sites near you. - Type in your zip code and schedule an appointment. *Must schedule before 12pm. Fasting only required if you are running a CardioMetabolic panel (lipid panel - cholesterol). - Be sure to bring your requisition form from Dr. Wolford and your insurance card. *Everything highlighted must be fill out and take a copy of your insurance card front and back. - All draw sites have kits on site. But I would encourage you to confirm with the labs when you schedule your appointment. BIOTICS ORDER's outside of FullScript: - Call 800.231.5777 to place your order. - Tell them you are with Dr.
